dcterms:description: The Pascal VOC 2012 dataset contains 1464 well-annotated images for training and 1449 images for validation, used for evaluating semantic segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC

dcterms:description: The CityScapes dataset is an urban scene dataset which includes 2975 training images and 500 validation images, designed for semantic urban scene understanding.
dcterms:title: CityScapes

dcterms:description: The Semantic Boundaries Dataset (SBD) provides a set of semantic contours from inverse detectors, used to improve semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: SBD (Semantic Boundaries Dataset)
